mdRecord.dcterms:title: Basilica of Saint Martin, Tours, exterior
Basilique de St-Martin
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Laloux, Victor Alexandre Frédéric (French architect, 1850-1937) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Basilica of St. Martin is a Roman Catholic basilica dedicated to Saint Martin of Tours, on whose tomb it was built. [work]

It was built between 1886 and 1924 on part of the site of the original Basilica, which was repurchased by the Church, to replace an earlier basilica, built in the Middle Ages and thoroughly demolished during the French Revolution. It was dedicated July 4, 1925. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basilica_of_St._Martin,_Tours [work]
